attributes.action: a law to Ban ear piercing to younger children/infants
attributes.additional_details: People are getting there babies ears pierced at as early as a few months old I don't think any baby or infant or young child should have piercings they are not able to defend them selfs.
attributes.background: Make a law to ban ear piercing to young children and infants who can't say no or have a choice it's child cruelty there needs to be a reasonable age law for this!

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105865

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
